Workflow.Name: Jordan Products Data to Excel and Entered into Apps
Workflow.Definition:
"@@ConnectionString: ''
@@Type: 'Local'
@@DesktopType: 'local'
@@DisplayName: 'Local computer'
IMPORT 'controlRepo.appmask' AS appmask
IMPORT 'imageRepo.imgrepo' AS imgrepo
@SENSITIVE: []
@INPUT InputName : { 'Description': 'Name of Person', 'FriendlyName': 'NewInput', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': True, 'DefaultValue': 'Chris' } 
# End of autogenerated actions using the recorder
WebAutomation.LaunchEdge.LaunchEdge Url: $'''https://www.nike.com/w/jordan-37eef''' WindowState: WebAutomation.BrowserWindowState.Normal ClearCache: False ClearCookies: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 Timeout: 60 PiPUserDataFolderMode: WebAutomation.PiPUserDataFolderModeEnum.AutomaticProfile TargetDesktop: $'''{\"DisplayName\":\"Local computer\",\"Route\":{\"ServerType\":\"Local\",\"ServerAddress\":\"\"},\"DesktopType\":\"local\"}''' BrowserInstance=> Browser
WAIT 2
WebAutomation.ExtractData.ExtractTable BrowserInstance: Browser Control: $'''html > body > div:eq(4) > div > div > div:eq(1) > div:eq(3) > div > div:eq(4) > div:eq(1) > main > section > div > div''' ExtractionParameters: {[$'''div > figure > a:eq(1) > div > img''', $'''Source Link''', $'''''', $'''Value #1'''], [$'''div > figure > a:eq(0)''', $'''Own Text''', $'''''', $'''Value #2'''] } PostProcessData: False TimeoutInSeconds: 60 ExtractedData=> DataFromWebPage
WebAutomation.CloseWebBrowser BrowserInstance: Browser
External.InvokeCloudConnector Connection: '' ConnectorId: '/providers/Microsoft.PowerApps/apis/shared_commondataserviceforapps' OperationId: 'PredictV2' @'item/requestv2/prompt': $'''Format the following data into a Comma Seperated Values. The values should be fully enclosed with double quotes. it should be:

Product Name, Image URL 
\"value of product name 1\", \"value of image url 1\"
\"value of product name 2\", \"value of image url 2\"

%DataFromWebPage%''' @PredictV2Response=> PredictV2Response @'responsev2/predictionOutput/text'=> PredictV2TextResponse
Display.ShowMessageDialog.ShowMessage Title: $'''GPT Generated Product CSV''' Message: PredictV2TextResponse Icon: Display.Icon.None Buttons: Display.Buttons.OK DefaultButton: Display.DefaultButton.Button1 IsTopMost: False ButtonPressed=> ButtonPressed
Clipboard.SetText Text: PredictV2TextResponse
Excel.LaunchExcel.LaunchUnderExistingProcess Visible: True Instance=> ExcelInstance
Excel.WriteToExcel.WriteCell Instance: ExcelInstance Value: $'''Image URL''' Column: $'''A''' Row: 1
Excel.WriteToExcel.WriteCell Instance: ExcelInstance Value: $'''Product Name''' Column: $'''B''' Row: 1
Excel.WriteToExcel.WriteCell Instance: ExcelInstance Value: DataFromWebPage Column: $'''A''' Row: 2
DateTime.GetCurrentDateTime.Local DateTimeFormat: DateTime.DateTimeFormat.DateAndTime CurrentDateTime=> CurrentDateTime
@@copilotGeneratedAction: 'True'
Text.ConvertDateTimeToText.FromCustomDateTime DateTime: CurrentDateTime CustomFormat: $'''yyyyMMdd''' Result=> FormattedDate
Excel.SaveExcel.SaveAs Instance: ExcelInstance DocumentFormat: Excel.ExcelFormat.OpenXmlWorkbook DocumentPath: $'''C:\\Users\\chscalzo\\Documents\\jordan-products-%FormattedDate%'''
@@copilotGeneratedAction: 'True'
Excel.CloseExcel.CloseAndSave Instance: ExcelInstance
File.WriteText File: $'''C:\\Users\\chscalzo\\Documents\\jordan-products.txt''' TextToWrite: PredictV2TextResponse AppendNewLine: True IfFileExists: File.IfFileExists.Overwrite Encoding: File.FileEncoding.Unicode
@@copilotGeneratedAction: 'True'
DISABLE External.Placeholder Category: 'AIDisclaimer' Message: 'Start of AI generated actions'
@@copilotGeneratedAction: 'True'
**REGION Loop through DataFromWebPage, launch and close Word instance
@@copilotGeneratedAction: 'True'
DISABLE LOOP FOREACH Item IN DataFromWebPage
 @@copilotGeneratedAction: 'True'
Word.LaunchWord.Launch Visible: True Instance=> WordInstance
 @@copilotGeneratedAction: 'True'
Word.CloseWord.Close Instance: WordInstance
@@copilotGeneratedAction: 'True'
DISABLE END
@@copilotGeneratedAction: 'True'
**ENDREGION
@@copilotGeneratedAction: 'True'
External.Placeholder Category: 'AIDisclaimer' SubCategory: 'CopilotFeedback' Message: 'End of AI generated actions'
"

LocalizedName.description: Jordan Products Data to Excel and Entered into Apps
